/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Modern buildings rise in the background, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
